place_description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of The Bowl at Ballantyne, a captivating destination where culinary delights, enriching experiences, and natural beauty converge. Stroll along the picturesque stream park, savor delectable flavors at a diverse array of eateries, and indulge in pampering services that elevate your every day. Discover a world of endless possibilities at The Bowl, where every moment is crafted to inspire and delight.

reviews_data.review_text: We had a lovely walk around the bowl, exploring the park & shops during the evening. Safe, family friendly atmosphere. Could use more lighting along walkways and in courtyards.
Great area.
Bad cuban sandwich . Glorified ham and cheese no pork
Went to the Bowl Street Pop Up Market here. Market is the 1st Saturday of every month from April-November 10a-3p. Was located on the green next to Harriet's Hamburgers. Enjoyed looking around!

Love this area! Harriet's is the best burger spot I've had in a while! Everything was so fresh. The secret sauce tastes good with your fries too! Bossy Beulah's wasn't good. I paid $10 for the wings & I only got 4 wings and they weren't seasoned at all. My husband said we will never go there again!

Great place to people watch and fun, chill environment for the entire family. Wonderful restaurants with plenty of options and more on the way. Green space for the kids to play. A sweet spot in Charlotte.
Very beautiful and peaceful,  restaurants are good kids play area. Perfect to make your evening more entertaining!!

Stream park is a great place to hang out with friends and family, kids favourite. Such a great place to just Grabbing a beer at OMB, quick lunch dates with gal pals or colleagues, dinner dates for a good Italian food is our favourite thing to do here. Love how live events take place and are kids friendly.
Nice
Great family friendly atmosphere. Great food and good vibes.
So many great places, cafe, restaurant, icecream, playground etc.
I come here for the eats. I wonder what events are held here. The area is still being renovated and built. However, the shops that are here are worth coming for a visit.
Such a cool place with plenty of restaurants and things to do!!
Very cute place to eat and hang out when the sun's out
Muy variada comida y un sitio para beber cerveza muy agradable
Nice place to hangout with kids

This vibrant spot offers a fantastic outdoor atmosphere, perfect for those who enjoy dining and drinking in the open air. With a great selection of food and beer, the festive ambiance makes it an excellent place to relax and unwind with friends and family.

The Bowl is a very family and pet friendly area.  There are a number of restaurants open with additional ones under construction. There is a great play area for your kiddos. I highly recommend setting some time aside to visit as the weather improves.
A very fun environment. All the restaurants are expensive, but you can still enjoy the outside areas.
Postinos for an afternoon cocktail, sandwich, and soup with one of my gfs! Such a fun spot!
Clean and the the people are friendly
Best place for coffee, a nice dinner or lunch, or hanging with friends.
Great spot with lots of solid restaurants and fun place to hangout.
Fly boy coffee is really good
I am really glad they built the Ballantyne bowl.  It has a nice variety of restaurants for everyone's taste and is great for a date night or time with the family.
Nice place to go out for the day or evening.
Love this place!
Great restaurants & awesome vibe
A very nice area, lots of places to eat but not all of them have high ratings.
Walkable with plenty of dining options!
Lots of restaurant choices albeit pricey. Parking can be tough at times.
Music. Restaurants. Brewery. Family oriented. Parking limited.
Beautiful space, went during Christmas time. Lots of food options and nice to walk around
Fun, vibrant place with lots of yummy food choices
Friendly atmosphere and good choice of high end and regular end, haha, restaurants.
great new place
Had a great time. Food and beer over the top.Will visit next time I am in Charlotte.
Perfect spot for family and friends.
Wonderful option for outdoor activities and a growing list of food options. One photo from Christmas Lights walk from the top of the parking garage.
Very nice place, but loud.
Nice little area, close to my apartment. Very pretty at Christmas

It's a great place to go for dining, I went to Flower Child and Honeysuckle gelato in the fall. They have a nice outdoor area to walk. There are other restaurants and a coffee shop. Parking can get full on weekends and it could be hard to find a spot to park.
An incredible place to eat, gather and shop!
It was very nice! Me and my family enjoyed the atmosphere!
Amazing Mall!!! Everything new, good variety of restaurants!!
such a lovely experience with my family,  and the chocolate pudding is #Everything
It is a good place to hang out with friends and family!
As more and more restaurants and shops are completed, this area will become one of Charlotte's go-to spots for dining, walking, biking, entertainment, and just hanging out.
Many good restaurants, around.

Great area! Parking is awful!  Poor plan by the design team.
Primarily parallel parking only!
We love it here! So much to do. Ballantyne needed this. Can't wait to see what else opens up.
Healthy, convenient and their soup is just perfect for the chilly weather.
Uprising outing area in Charlotte. Love the area a lot. Parking is a challenge though
Beautiful place to visit with a variety of restaurants.  #travel #vacation #foodie
The park is awesome and the food is great.
Still in the development stages. I'll be awesome once everything is done
Amphitheater desperately needs some bathrooms
Food is amazing!!!

Wonderful place to listen to the venues.
A great selection of wonderful food establishments
Ask for light salt on the burger, otherwise it's very salty.

Awesome outdoor space to bring kids and family. 

Super restaurant selection to dine and drink indoors or outdoors. 

Well done Northwood!!

Octoberfest was an enjoyable family event that my family enjoyed. The one hiccup was that when I bought beer & Bratwurst my card was used to charge other items. I notified my bank and am getting new card ,but was not expecting that to happen there.

We attended the opening weekend at the bowl which was during the Octoberfest festivities. The vibe was pleasant, many options for resting and a family friendly environment as a playground is there for kids. Will definitely be back to meet up with friends.
This area is fairly new and still developing, but it has a lot of potential.
Great new place

Very hip and clean area. Still alot of construction going on and prices are on the high side but I think given time this area will be a big success. I'll visit again once they get more of the retail opened.
Local muito agradavel e bonito
Lot of my favorite dining places Roosters, Harriet's Burgers, n Bossy B.  Love the lights at night.  A nice place to late night dine n walk for a chat for sure.
It can be real busy. Bring your patience.
Beautiful set up
Very "bicycle friendly" place
Nice development. The chairs down by the water are perfect not far from the playground area for kids
Mecktoberfest was awesome.   Good food,,, really nice staff.  Everyone at the bowl was having a good time. Looking forward to when we can return.
Recomendado
For me, it was just ok
Love the vibe. Great choices for food.
Excelente espacio para disfrutar en familia y con amigos. Hay variedad de restaurantes y heladerias para disfrutar. Volveria a visitarlo
Several restaurants opened! Good Family atmosphere. Several new restaurants will open soon too.

Not impressed. It's a parking lot fish bowl. There was so much potential. It's sad the parking lot is the focal point between the restaurants and greenways. Reddit has already dubbed it "The Toilet Bowl."
Random flower vendors selling flowers creating hazards
Felt more like a plate than a bowl. 4/5
It will definitely be better once the construction is done. Food options were decent, wish there was retail shops.

Worked and lived in the area for almost 8-years right next to the Ballantyne Hotel. It's incredible how much the Ballantyne Bowl changed the culture of the area by mixing a wonderful green space/park with tons of Charlotte's up and coming food and drink spots. Wonderful place for the family or just grab a bite to eat and sit outside a bit and enjoy the atmosphere.
Very good! Service and the food.

With everything they tore down to build all of this they could have better parking options. It took us 30 minutes to find parking. We went to Bossy Beulah's for dinner, Do not recommend. Food was bland and expensive, not worth the cost. The woman at the table next to us couldn't even eat her sandwich. Beulah can keep that recipe a secret.
Had a great time at a show here and some good restaurants around too.
Sweet area to hang out

They've done an amazing job with this development, everything is beautiful and high end. Great walking paths and landscaping. However they do need to enforce parking better. There were dozens of cars parked in the bike lanes, blocking them completely :(
This will become the best hangout spot in Charlotte! So many great food and drink options, things to do for families, and more.
Apartment blocks big and tall. Food is good and healthy though I've cream have very limited flavors
Nice hangout place
Great place to walk around, eat nice Italian food and also brewery with German food
Hanging out after work, great service wonderful vibes food was excellent.

New food spot in ballantyne. They are still in the process of adding more restaurants here. So far, only about 3 open restaurants. Postino, north Italian, and flower child are open. There is plenty of parking with a brewery. I believe there is also a park in this area. If you live close by, def. Something to do. There is also an amphitheater where a lot of concerts are help at.
Visited for the first time. Will definitely be back.
Un lugar bien tranquilo

This place is very small, there's a few restaurants and a brewery but it is barely walkable. I don't understand the hype when the park is just a patch of grass.

This place is very boring not worth the drive.
Super nice and clean area with lots to do. I love riding my bike here and on nearby greenways.
Cute area with great walking trails, delicious restaurants and park that doubles as music venue.
Amazing atmosphere, great shops and a brand new AMP theatre. Nice place to visit.

The area is still in the development phase with several restaurants still coming. At least two parking lots which are both free to the public. There are two condos in development. Personally, I believe the area will be a must see once finished.
This area is starting to get some great little shops. I can't wait till they are all open. Honeysuckle Gelato was a great addition. Super nice people and delish gelato. Try the Bourbon.

This place is amazing. There was a lot of restaurants nice and beautiful park. Nice hang out spot. (Hang out) 10/10.     (The park) 8/10. Feed back for the park a little more activity.  But still amazing.(Hotels) 9/10 I know I have not been in all but some were a little clumped. But if I had to rate the Balentine hotel that will be a 10/10. Over all thought's, this place is amazing best time to come is around 10:00pm to 12:00 am. There's a nice fountain to sit buy the park is so modern. And there's a mini rock climbing. A nice walk area and if you are a hotel guest then you can go in there nice spa, pool and the nice 1900 hundred type bar. So over all score. 20/10. Definitely recommend. And yes I will definitely return, have a good night and nice work.

This is fantastic new complex in Ballantyne with a variety of shops, excellent dining options, and the standout brewery, OMB. The outdoor dining areas and common spaces are beautifully designed, providing a perfect setting for relaxation. With ample room for kids to play, it's an ideal family getaway spot.
This place is awesome! The developers have hit a home run.  Love the look of the streetscapes and the diverse mix of restaurants.
Great place to hang out!
